title: Add complete contact details and company logo

requirements.summary: Update contact section to display phone numbers 8329880055 and 9765729905, email b11082004@gmail.com, and address 'Nagpur Narendra Nagar, pincode 440015'
acceptanceCriteria: Contact section displays both phone numbers clearly
Contact section displays the email address
Contact section displays the complete address with pincode

file_operations.description: Update the contact information cards to display phone numbers (8329880055 and 9765729905), email (b11082004@gmail.com), and address (Nagpur Narendra Nagar, pincode 440015) using the data fetched from the backend getContactInfo query. Ensure both phone numbers are displayed with appropriate labels (e.g., 'Phone 1' and 'Phone 2'), the email is displayed with proper mailto link, and the complete address with pincode is shown in a readable format.

requirements.summary: Display generated company logo prominently in header component
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image is displayed in the header component
Logo is visible on all viewport sizes (desktop and mobile)
Logo appears alongside or replaces the 'AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES' text branding
Logo uses the generated logo asset from frontend/public/assets/generated

file_operations.description: Add the company logo image to the header component using the generated logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-akanksha.dim_300x300.png. Position the logo alongside or before the 'AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES' text branding in the logo section. Ensure the logo is responsive and visible on both desktop and mobile viewports by applying appropriate sizing classes (e.g., h-10 or h-12). Update both the desktop and mobile navigation sections to include the logo image element.
